chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: Hadnan Kadere, p. 78 (57)—Merchant who is absorbed into the group moving through the Waste from Rhuidean. He is a Darkfriend, and came into the Waste with two odd traveling companions, Keille Shaogi and Jasin Natael. He is a dark, bulky man from Saldaea. See also Isendre; Natael, Jasin; Shaogi, Keille.
